author: Megan Ellis
title: Try these unusual beach activities
text:
Try these unusual beach activities Article By: Megan Ellis Mon, 27 Jul 2015 3:02 PM Share Credit: pixabay.com/ Goodgood 
Is a normal trip to the beach too run-of-the-mill for you? Well then you might be interested in these unusual, weird and wonderful beach activities around the world. 
Travel Republic has created a great infographic showing some of the unusual beach activities available around the world. 
Did you know that in Puerto Rico you can stroll along the bioluminescent sand of Mosquito Bay? The shores literally glow at night! 
In Maui, Hawaii, you can experience a paddle-board yoga class - if you have the balance. 
See these and more activities below: 
Unfortunately, the infographic doesn't show all 57 activities. 
For the full 57 activities, visit the Travel Republic blog. Related Articles
